title: Ken Carbone
description: In this audio interview with Debbie Millman, Ken Carbone discusses meeting his design heros, his celebrated sketchbooks and journals and what he really thinks about his relationship with his corporate clients.
itunes:subtitle: In this audio interview with Debbie Millman, Ken Carbone discusses  meeting his design heros, his celebrated sketchbooks and journals and  what he really thinks about his relationship with his corporate clients.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
